phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
It is so pretty.
Where am I?
It cannot be...
Is this heaven?!
I refuse to die, damn it!
I am so sorry!
Asta...
What are you talking about?
There is not a chance you would actually die.
Yuno!
Noelle and Mimosa...
And Mr. Glasses!
I was worried about you.
Thank goodness!
I do not know what I would do if you had not woken up!
How long are you going to hold on to each other?!
I am injured here!
Hmph!
The Magic Knights Captain Conference
What?!
I was asleep for a whole day?!
Yes.
You were even snoring.
Must have been a nice nap.
That just means he was able to use all of his strength to fight.
We wanted to fight with you, but by the time we got there,
the Eye of the Midnight Sun had escaped.
You guys contacted us too late.
That is why we were caring for you after you were brought to the church, Asta.
Thanks for the recovery magic, Mimosa.
Oh, it is nothing at all, really.
The one who worked the hardest to make sure you were okay is Klaus.
A-Ahem...
More importantly, thanks to you and the others,
it appears that all of the kidnapped children are safe.
Also, regarding the perpetrator Neige,
they are interrogating him back at headquarters.
I am assuming he knows nothing about the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
They are taking into consideration
his deep regret and the fact that he meant no harm.
I think he is going to be doing volunteer work
here at this church to pay for his crimes.
I see.
That is perfect for him!
Anyway, it sounds like you did a great job again
If I were there, I would not have let the Eye of the Midnight Sun escape.
I will get them for sure next time!
Yuno!
I am never going to lose to you!
I am still going to keep getting stronger and stronger!
And I will continue to get even stronger than you.
Then I am going to keep trying more, more, and even more!
And then one day...
Oh, you two get along so well!
Huh?
Not a chance.
We should probably take our leave.
Yes.
Oh, yes!
Sister Theresa also just woke up not too long ago.
Huh?
Gauche should be with her right now.
Hey, I came to see you, old hag who does not know when to die.
Is that how you talk to an injured person?
Get the hell out, you sister complex punk.
What?
Should I just finish you off, since you do not know when to die?
Go ahead and try.
Then you will go right back to the slammer,
you sister complex punk with a criminal record.
Do not fight with her, Brother!
Well, if that is what you want, Marie.
And...
I guess I am at least grateful that you took care of Marie, you stupid old hag.
Hmph.
I guess you have grown, if you can actually thank people.
Also...
I am glad you are alive.
I see.
Now, my beloved angel Marie, praise your big brother for not arguing!
Pardon me!
It is Asta!
Yay!
I was worried about you!
I will not die!
I am going to kill you after all.
He is still got a long way to go.
How are you feeling, Granny?
Who do you think I am?
More importantly, when I tell your Sister Lily
about all of your heroic deeds this time, I am sure she will be pleased.
True!
Sister Lily!
Soon I will become the Wizard King and come for you!
Asta, we have to head back soon.
Wait, there is one place we have to visit first.
It is so good!
This is so frickin' good!
R-Really?
I was cooking so you would have plenty to eat when you woke up,
but I guess I made a little too much.
What is this?
This is really good.
So good!
I will kill him.
I will kill him.
Oh, come on, Brother!
I am not done eating yet!
I will kill him...
I will kill him...
I will kill him...
I wonder if guys prefer girls who can cook, after all.
Asta!
Thanks for lending me your robe!
Sure.
Looks like you kept it clean, just like you promised.
Yup!
Your robe may be fine, but look how beaten up you got!
It looks like you are hopeless without me.
I am pretty sure I get beat up even when you are around, Noelle.
Someone he can fight alongside, huh?
Oh, shut up, Stupidsta!
I know I cannot use recovery magic like Mimosa!
True.
Asta...
Sorry, but I am getting the first kiss.
Thank you for saving Luca and Marco, Asta!
Huh?
Huh?
H-H-Hey... Wh-Wh-What?!
Shrimpsta!
Did you burn off your lunch?!
Yes, sir!
All right!
We are going to have a traditional Black Bulls eating contest
to commemorate your full recovery!
This time, we are having tato pies!
Thanks!
I am starving!
Have we done something like this before?
Nope!
More importantly, you should fight me!
I wish I could have fought the Third Eye!
Marie, we have already been apart half a day...
I want to give Asta a surprise party, too.
Yeah, I am going to pass.
If I ate this much, I would just get a stomachache and end up in bed.
I am also going to pass.
What are you trying to make a royal like me do?
Shut yer traps!
All of you are participating, whether you like it or not.
All right, Mr. Yami!
Please do us the honor of being the judge!
All right, if you are all done complaining now...
Ready... go!
So good!
It is instantly dehydrating me...
Hey, I have not even eaten, but I am already full!
Hup!
Hup!
Hup!
Hup!
Finral, you bastard.
Stop using your spatial magic to dump all this into Luck's stomach.
You caught me.
Aw, but I cannot eat these if I do not have some pretty lady feeding me.
You are out.
Flame Magic: Explosive Reheating!
I thought they would taste better if I baked them a little more, but I overcooked them.
You are out.
I have still got plenty of room for seconds!
Hi.
Gordon?!
What are you doing there?!
You can keep eating.
Here, say, Ah.
You are being creepy, so you are out.
I would rather devour Marie than do something this stupid.
You are both out since you have not eaten a damn thing!
Hydration... Hydration...
They were both done a long time ago.
The only ones left are...
Asta and Charmy are head-to-head!
All right!
I will show you I can win this without using magic!
Results
As for the results,
Charmy won without using magic.
Victor: Charmy Pappitson
You have still got a lot to learn, kid.
My identity!
No one's surprised.
That crest...
That is a letter from the royal capital, is not it?
Is there an incident?
Do we need to take action?!
Shut up and rest.
Or so I would like to say... but it looks like the Wizard King wants to see you.
The Wizard King?!
The other captains and I have a conference tomorrow, so he says to bring you along.
I wonder what he wants!
Like I know.
You will find out when you get there.
Wizard King,
I have sent a message to all of
the Magic Knights Captains regarding tomorrow's conference.
Thanks,
Marx.
I do not want to believe it,
but it is clear that there is a traitor among us
who is connected to the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
And I will find out who it is tomorrow.
But...
Are you sure this is going to work?
It will all depend on Asta.
We have been waiting for you,
Captain of the Black Bulls, Yami Sukehiro, and
Asta.
Um...
Who are you again?
I guess this is the first time we have really spoken to one another.
I am...
Mushroom Head.
Yes, Mushroom Head.
Hey!
Please do not be so rude!
Wizard King's Advisor Marx Francois
My name is Marx.
I am the Wizard King's advisor.
The Wizard King's?!
You are awesome, Mushroom Head!
Well, it is definitely a lot of work.
Also, my name's Marx, not Mushroom Head.
So, where is the conference being held, Mushroom Head?
It is M-a-r-x!
It will take a bit more time to finish preparing for the conference,
so please wait with the other captains.
Would you come with me, Asta?
I heard you fought splendidly the other day, Asta.
I am sure you will receive at least another ten stars from the Wizard King.
Seriously?!
All right!
Wait...
Where are we?
We are headed to an underground prison that very few in the royal capital know of.
We keep important prisoners down here.
Important prisoners?
You know that we have captured members of the
Eye of the Midnight Sun who were involved in the attack against the capital, right?
Then the ones in the underground prison...
Yes.
They have a spell on them that protects their memories,
so we have not been able to get any info about the Eye of the Midnight Sun yet.
But the Wizard King thought that your anti-magic sword
could possibly undo the protection.
When they attacked the capital, they were always one step ahead of us.
That would have been impossible unless they had help from the inside.
We are pretty certain there is a traitor among us,
and it is someone rather high up.
On the level of a Magic Knights Captain.
N-No way!
We would rather not believe that, either.
That is why we want to clear things up.
We are here.
Right...
Hello?
Hey, Asta.
Great work again.
Th-The Wizard King!
It is great to see you!
Sorry to bring you here when you are probably tired,
but you are the only one who can use the anti-magic sword.
By the way, I heard you fought with the higher-ups of the Eye of the Midnight Sun!
What kinds of magic did they use?
Wh-What kinds?
Say what?!
Copy magic?
They can copy other people's magic?
That is amazing!
Beast magic?!
I have never heard of that before!
What?!
Spirit magic?!
Fire?
So, the Salamander?!
I would have loved to see all of that!
Um...
Wizard King!
Oh, sorry about that.
All right, Asta.
Could you give it a try?
Do you think you can do it?
I believe so!
As you wish, Wizard King!
What is the deal with that brat?
This is not good.
That is the brat who uses anti-magic.
He is planning on breaking the protection spell that is on our memories.
Do not...
Do not touch me, you stupid brat!
Hi-yah!
Now, Marx.
Yes, sir.
Memory Exchange Magic: Memoire Absolue!
Wh-What is this?
I have made a connection directly into their heads,
and this spell allows me to get answers from their true memories.
Now they will not be able to hide anything anymore.
That is so cool...
I know, right?!
It is such an awesome spell!
Is not it cool?!
Yeah!
Silence!
I need quiet, please!
Yes, sir...
I will ask you both a number of questions.
Answer me honestly.
Understood?
Yes.
Captain of the Purple Orcas Gueldre Poizot
I heard about your work at Nean.
To think that four Magic Knights Captains would actually let the terrorists escape.
Captain of the Green Praying Mantises Jack the Ripper
They are nothing like the weaklings you guys were dealing with
from the Diamond Kingdom and the Spade Kingdom!
Says the captain of a squad with fewer stars than mine.
You sure you are not doing anything underhanded to get those stars?
Captain of the Black Bulls Yami Sukehiro
Man, the gleam on a new katana is something else.
Sucks that I will be making payments on it for ten years, though.
Anyway, calm down, Original Scrawny Line-Face Guy.
What Garbledre is saying is the truth.
It is Gueldre.
You are the last person I want to hear that from, No-Stars Yami.
Captain of the Coral Peacocks Dorothy Unsworth
Whatever.
I have got plenty of black stars.
Those are negative stars!
Why are you proud of that?
Captain of the Silver Eagles Nozel Silva
Silence, you foreigner and former peasant.
You are annoying.
What was that, Mister Royalty?
Do you want to join in?
Captain of the Blue Rose Knights Charlotte Roselei
How stupid.
We are getting nowhere because of you noisy men.
Why am I next to Yami?!
Calm down, Charlotte.
Stay calm...
Calm...
Captain of the Aqua Deer Rill Boismortier
I guess they have not decided on a temporary captain for the Crimson Lion Kings yet.
If Fuegoleon was here, he would pull things together really well, but...
Did the air just get really heavy?!
I am the youngest, so I need to lighten the mood!
Look!
This is my Fuegoleon impression!
What do you think you are doing?
Do not let the fact that you are the youngest captain ever go to your head.
Huh?!
You are a funny guy!
Sorry to keep you all waiting.
Captain of the Golden Dawn William Vangeance
I apologize for being late.
What were you doing, Vangeance?
Oh, there was some business I could not get out of.
I expect you are busy.
You are the charismatic captain of the squad with the most stars this term, after all.
I would love to know your secret.
How did you claw your way up to become the strongest squad so very fast?
I hear those who join your squad will develop powers beyond all expectations.
Do you have magic that can see people's futures?
I have no power that impressive.
My knights work hard, that is all.
Really, I would like to ask you, a wealthy merchant, the trick to making so much money.
That is a company secret.
I have been thinking this for a while, but the way you laugh is creepy.
Why would you bring that up now?
Also, you resemble a boneless ham.
Vangeance...
Where were you during the distinguished service ceremony?
It is customary for a captain to accompany members
of his squad when they attend the ceremony.
Business you could not get out of again?
I was out gambling.
I lost all my money.
Sorry.
No one asked you.
The air got heavy again!
This time, I will do it right!
And you, if you are attempting to do an impression of me, you would better be prepared.
You are right!
It is not easy to do that braid over your face!
Man, you are hilarious.
Come on, do not pick on Goldy.
I mean, you do not use light magic, do you?
Indeed.
And there it goes again!
Look, everyone!
This is my Yami impression!
Keep your mouth shut, Fluffy!
Huh?!
You must have been really spoiled growing up, rich kid.
Well, do not expect the same treatment from me, loser.
He was laughing before, but suddenly snapped?!
And you!
Quit sleeping!
Oh, can you talk in snores?
I have no idea what you are saying, though!
Not to mention, Julius was the one who called us all here, so where is he?!
That old guy better not have forgotten us and wandered off somewhere!
That is very possible.
I apologize for keeping you waiting.
Everything is ready,
so if you would hold the conference in another room
Huh?!
You come here!
Huh?!
He is snapped?!
Hey, kid.
Working hard?
Y-Yes, sir.
Great work, sir.
Does he need to take a dump or something?
What did you need, Wizard King?
Those two are from the Eye of the Midnight Sun...
Did you learn something from them?
Yes.
Several things, thanks to Marx and Asta.
I suppose this is the biggest one.
I have learned that there is a traitor among you
who is working with the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
Petit Clover!
Memory Exchange Magic!!
Memory Exchange Magic.
Memoire Absolue!
I will ask you a series of questions.
Answer me honestly.
Okay.
If you were asked to choose between being the Wizard King
and your obsession with magic...
Obsession with magic.
I knew it!
I-In that case...
What do you think about me?
You can be a bit naggy, but you are a hard worker.
I am always grateful.
I see...
Because of that, I can concentrate more on my obsession with magic,
rather than being the Wizard King.
What?!
There is a traitor in this dungeon?
The Magic Knights are
supposed to be people everyone in the Clover Kingdom can look up to!
I am going to teach you a lesson!
Black Clover, Page 39: Three-Leaf Salute.
Page 39 Three-Leaf Salute
I will not forgive the traitor!
